author: draganrakita
content: I missed the obvious thing, gas price and base fee are same and cancel each other. Thank you!

author: andreiiv.
content:
<@393119312350543872> Hi. I had a difficulty to run `hive` locally . I tried to run `./test.sh` and got a following error `./test.sh: line 32: ./hive: No such file or directory`                         Tried to run `./hive --sim ethereum/sync --client go-ethereum `, got
`zsh: no such file or directory: ./hive.`   Can you advice please how I can run it locally to investigate how ti works internally?

author: marioevz
content: You need to compile hive first: `go build -v .`
